subject: Soccer
Copa America (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Brazil gave up a quick goal to Peru in its opening match at the Copa América, reviving memories of its rout at the World Cup by Germany, but then rallied behind Neymar for a 2-1 victory.
snippet: Brazil gave up a quick goal to Peru in its opening match at the Copa América, reviving memories of its rout at the World Cup by Germany, but then rallied behind Neymar for a 2-1 victory.
